website_summaries.verdict: The Phonix 7 impressively made a lot of users happy because of its performance and affordable price. A great stability shoe for overpronators, the Asics Gel Phoenix 7 offers enough amount of cushioning, support, protection, and durability. This shoe is ideal for those who are looking for a reliable road running gear for long or short-distance runs.
pros: Most runners were impressed by the durability feature of the Gel Phoenix 7
This shoe features a reflective material for increased visibility on low visibility
It features a removable sockliner to accommodate a medical orthotic
Some runners noticed the enhanced AHAR outsole material on this shoe that gives added cushioning and durability
The 7th version of the Gel Phoenix has improved that bounce-back characteristic of the shoe, according to a small number of reviews
cons: Some runners hoped to see more color options

customer_reviews.title: Great value, quality running shoe
customer_reviews.text: Always go for the Asics running shoes with extra arch support and again, these live up to the expectation of great value shoes, with the right amount of support. I am a professional athlete, so keeping fit is on the forefront of my mind. I wear out my trainers within months (as I use them so much) so finding a good quality shoe at a great value is of importance to me. I am not bothered about the colour, but it is very bright, which some might find a problem - for me it is of no consequence.
customer_reviews.author: Sailor

customer_reviews.title: Walking on clouds
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes they fit so comfortably and when you wear them it's like walking on a mattress or a cloud or something and they're so lightweight, I wasn't sure what I was expecting when I bought these, to me shows are shoes lol but these blew me away, so light and comfortable they're perfect for when I go running, jogging or to the gym. I can't get over how amazing they feel to wear.
customer_reviews.author: CrazyChris

customer_reviews.title: Excellent running shoe for the money
customer_reviews.text: A little expensive. Elsewhere on Amazon it was 25 pounds cheaper, but delivery was very slow so I cancelled. These delivered next day and the shoe is very comfortable as it has raised arches and quite a wide fit. The colour is nice and bright. All in all very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: D. Chiles

customer_reviews.title: Excellent trainers, light and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Used them for two days.Excellent trainers, light and comfortable. Left them outside my door after a run and they were stolen within 10 minutes, I guess that too is a recommendation, in its own way.
customer_reviews.author: drb0b

customer_reviews.title: Great trainers
customer_reviews.text: I get through a lot of trainers - and they're all Asics Gel. These are extremely comfortable and I think they look great.
customer_reviews.author: blackjazz

customer_reviews.title: my husband is happy with these trainers
customer_reviews.text: Fit well, my husband is happy with these trainers. So far using them on the treadmill, felt comfortable from the start.
customer_reviews.author: Rose Noble

customer_reviews.title: seconds
customer_reviews.text: nice shoes arrived in time. all these are seconds so have minor faults . mine had large splashes of paint on the side of the soles
customer_reviews.author: Vish B

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice fit and very comfortable. Bought to replace a pair of Asics Galaxy.
customer_reviews.author: PETER SPRINGTHORPE

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: He loves them and wears them every day, he says he bounces on them!
customer_reviews.author: V Neves Pedro

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable, fit as expected, if anything slightly big, but fine
customer_reviews.author: Chris, Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good pairs of shoes. Took a little time to break in - as expected now fit like glove!
customer_reviews.author: joshua

customer_reviews.title: top notch!
customer_reviews.text: first class pair of trainers. Great fit and very comfy to run in. Delivery was very prompt, great service
customer_reviews.author: simon kirkby

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: An excellent trainer for the moderate overpronators. Price more expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Mario Xerri

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good quality shoe for the price.. Still wearing them in but they're a good second pair
customer_reviews.author: Sam Bates

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I s not them back for a smaller size and haven't received any back!
customer_reviews.author: Mr. DA Black

customer_reviews.title: Great trainers
customer_reviews.text: Great condition and they fit really well. Comfy running for me.
customer_reviews.author: vanbento

customer_reviews.title: Happy with the purchase
customer_reviews.text: Quick delivery, item is as described. Happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice running shoes from a beginner
customer_reviews.text: I'm new to road running and decided that I needed to get some decent trainers as my normal trainers were making a bit of a mess of my feet. I looked at a few reviews and found it difficult to decide which brand to go for. I decided that Asics have always had a good reputation and to go with that. Very comfortable, the thicker sole has definitely helped me. Most reviews for Asics tend to say that the fit is smaller than expected and I'd go along with that. Possibly order half a size bigger than you would normally go for. Decent ankle support. Very impressed
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Gel Phoenix 7 running shoes
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable exactly as Asics usually are. Not sure if these are seconds, though, as there were tiny speckles of apparent paint spray evident on the white sole inner sidewalls on both shoes. Not so bad that I'd want to complain as they are for running in not dinner dates, but if these are seconds, they surely should say. Otherwise really nice.
customer_reviews.author: Kerry

customer_reviews.title: Good trainers
customer_reviews.text: These trainers were bought to replace a pair of Asics gel evation trainers. My first thought was that these ones are far heavier than the gel evation ones. However I have been wearing them for around a month and I have now gotten used to them. They are really comfortable fit well and offer God support. I would buy these trainers again.
customer_reviews.author: Mo

customer_reviews.title: Super comfy, stable and supportive.
customer_reviews.text: These are probably the most comfortable running shoes I have ever bought. 50kms racked up already. I have to put arch supports in all my shoes and they slipped in these no problem and are very nice to run in.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: ASICS Gel-Phoenix 7, Men's Running Shoes
product_meta.description: The Asics Gel Phoenix 7 Running Shoes are constructed with a breathable mesh upper, allowing the air to fully permeate the shoe. The upper is stitched around a canvas and attached directly to the midsole which helps to provide better support underfoot during training. A removable sockliner keeps the foot snug, but gives the added option of being able to remove when needed. Effective shock absorption is provided thanks to the new SpEVA 55 Midsole material, meaning improved bounce back characteristics and a reduction in muscle fatigue during those longer runs. The rear and forefoot GEL cushioning systems also help to attenuate shock during impact and toe-off phases, allowing movement in multiple planes as the foot transitions through the gait cycle. The Dynamic DuoMax Support System is comprised of a dual density midsole system, positioned to enhance support and stability. A Trusstic System reduces the weight of the sole unit while retaining the structural integrity of the shoe for a lightweight ride underfoot. With 3M reflectivity, these shoes also provide improved visibility when running in low-light conditions. The durable outsole is reinforced with ASICS (AHAR+) High Abrasion Resistance rubber, built for exceptional durability.
feature_bullets: Breathable Mesh Upper - Allows ventilation whilst keeping the foot cool during training.
Removable Sockliner - Moulded to the shape of the foot, which can be removed to accommodate a medical orthotic.
SpEVA 55 Midsole - Midsole material that improves bounce back characteristics and decreases midsole breakdown.
DuoMax Support System - A dual-density midsole system positioned to enhance support and stability.
Rearfoot and Forefoot GEL Cushioning - Attenuates shock during impact and toe-off phases, and allows movement in multiple planes as the foot transitions through the gait cycle.
